7ee9c27b-786a-4574-aea9-f2ce1c0f5bbb.name: 视力不良（远视）
7ee9c27b-786a-4574-aea9-f2ce1c0f5bbb.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

0e43175c-3e59-4c55-befb-daf70f2c74ed.name: 视力不良（近视）
0e43175c-3e59-4c55-befb-daf70f2c74ed.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
